channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Secret Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Secret Server

item.title: CVE-2019-4632|2024-09-16T16:22:57.810Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 170004.

item.title: CVE-2020-4840|2024-09-16T16:19:00.510Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.6 could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 190044.
